Effect: Call in a Sandstorm bomber that carpet-bombs the target location with smoke bombs four times in each run
The smoke bombs halves the firepower of units for 180 frames (12 in-game seconds)
Notes: A red flare will be displayed at designated zone right after support power deployment
Sandstorm stats:Hit points: 1125Armor type: Medium AircraftSpeed: 28 (jet)Turn rate: 1Cooldown: 12 frames (0.8 in-game seconds)Range: 13, radius 4
